projects.description: Dixa’s next-gen chatbot for customer service.
which: Chatbot support agent that reduces human customer service workload
Knowledge Base data loading for Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG)
Improving agent Flow Builder and automations

projects.description: Adding native channel integrations to Dixa's platform.
which: Integrating third party messaging apps with Dixa's platform to provide an omnichannel customer service experience.
Defining and implementing webhooks and apis for external integrations.
Adding new features and capabilities to existing channels
Monitoring and improving existing production systems

projects.description: Working on AI authentication systems and genuine security.
which: Designing and improving an event-driven platform that provides real-time digital authentication.
Working in a team of 10-12 people from product, QA and data science
Leverage and orchestrate machine learning models used as core of the user authentication predictions.

projects.description: Ingest data from a wide range of sources and formats to the data lake
which: Ensuring data from diferent sources landed to the data lake in a timely manner
Designing and implementing data pipelines to ingest data from different sources
Development of a the delta-framework, used internally to deal with slow changing dimensionalities.
